column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We had the Lou's and a half cheese-half pepperoni and they did not disappoint- loved the buttery crust. The pleasant surprise of the meal? The house salad! My friend ordered the family side for all of us to share
column2: and the home made dressing was amazing! I'm not a big salad eater but I could have filled up on that! Definitely coming back!
